response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. I am confident that with its acquisition, you will unlock new opportunities and achieve greater success. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or arrange a demonstration of the product's capabilities. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1250000}
